title: HUGE 3 Bed 3 Bath Duplex w. Private Terrace in Hudson Yards
posting_body: ['With over 2,200 square feet, this 3 Bed 3 Bath duplex, PLUS oversized terrace is the perfect retreat within NYC.', 'It features a large walk-in closet, floor to ceiling windows, custom solar shades, solid white oak flooring, 9 feet ceilings, and comes equipped with a stackable washer and dryer.', 'The modern gourmet kitchen has a wine refrigerator, CaesarStone countertops, and stainless steel energy-efficient appliances.', 'Two of the baths feature deep soaking tubs with rain shower heads and the main bath features a stall shower.', 'When it comes to entertaining, the rooftop deck showcases panoramic views of Manhattan and it has its own private screening area to host a moving night.', 'This chic apartment building also has a resident lounge with a pool table and TVs, as well as a private gym with Precor cardio equipment and a yoga studio.', '**Available on 8/19**', 'THE BUILDING:', 'Bike Room', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Fitness Center', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Central AC', 'Concierge', 'Billiards Room', 'Fitness Room', 'Pets Allowed', 'Resident Lounge', 'Roof Deck', 'THE LOCATION:', 'Close to the City University of New York, Brooklyn Fare, The Edge, The Vessel, Javitz Center, Times Square, Port Authority, Penn Station, Restaurant Row, Equinox, Hudson Yards, The High Line, Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum, Target, Pier 76, Whole Foods, and easily accessible via the 1, 2, 3, 7, A, C, E, N, Q, R, W, S lines.', '*Photos represent the finishes.', '*1 month brokers fee applies.', '*Apartment is currently occupied; contact me to set up a future tour or to sign virtually.', 'I also have other options in the area.', '*Call, text, or reply for more information or to schedule a showing.', '(For a faster response please call or text.)', 'William Noorlag | Nest Seekers International', '323.219.4160']
